links.title: Jim Cramer: If Gary Cohn Leaves Trump White House, Investors May Take Profits
links.description: Amid the announcement of President Trump's trade tariffs, media reports are wondering about the future of National Economic Council Director Gary Cohn, who was reportedly against the tariffs. "I feel very, very strongly that if Gary leaves, that's a reason that people would pause and say I'm going to take profits in XYZ," said TheStreet's founder and Action Alerts PLUS Portfolio Manager Jim Cramer.

links.title: KGI: Apple to release more affordable 13-inch MacBook Air in Q2, HomePod demand 'mediocre' so far
links.description: Reliable Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo of KGI Securities is today out with a pair of new investor notes on Apple. links.title: Apple, Micron, Applied Materials, Square, Ligand: Top Stocks For Aggressive Traders As S&P 500, Dow Jones Struggle | Stock News & Stock Market Analysis - IBD
links.description: Ideas for your watch list this week are five tech stocks that are holding up during the market sell-off: Apple ( AAPL), Micron ( MU), Applied Materials ( AMAT), Square ( SQ) and Ligand Pharmaceuticals ( LGND). Micron, Applied Materials, Square and Ligand Pharmaceuticals have Composite Ratings above 95, a hallmark of all-time stock winners near the start of big runs.
